product_name: The North Face Luciena Down Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Insulated with 700-fill-power goose down,The North Face Luciena Down Jacket for women is lightweight yet exceptionally warm, and offers stretch for freedom of movement on slopes or busy city streets. Full-stretch outer and inner fabric really lets you move easily. Durable water repellent finish beads up snow and sleet. Premium 700-fill-power, water-resistant goose down is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible, and dries faster than non-treated down. Darts define the waist for a flattering fit; adjustable hood adds warmth. Internal media pocket has a headphone port. The North Face Luciena Down Jacket for women has invisible-zip hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Insulated with 700-fill-power goose down,The North Face Luciena Down Jacket for women is lightweight yet exceptionally warm, and offers stretch for freedom of movement on slopes or busy city streets.
